name: Special dinner
desc: In Los Cocos Bungalows we know how to make a special day bright and unforgetable. Enjoy a dinner for 2 in our lovely Greeny Restaurant for an additional €45 per couple.

name: Surf classes
desc: Learn the basics of surfing in our incredible bay. For only €25 per hour you will have such a great time in family and will learn a fun activity.

name: Horse Riding
desc: Gallop through the gorgeous greenery of one of Catalonia's most majestic natural parks on a half-day horse-riding tour from Barcelona.

name: Best Museums
desc: Visit the 6 best museums in Barcelona with Articket, the Art Passport with which you can save up to 45% and keep a memory of your visit.
